thread.title: Holly Willoughby shares rare video of youngest son Chester naming all the Paw Patrol characters
thread.title_full: Holly Willoughby shares rare video of youngest son Chester naming all the Paw Patrol characters

author: jrobinson
title: Holly Willoughby shares rare video of youngest son Chester naming all the Paw Patrol characters
text:
A post shared by Holly Willoughby (@hollywilloughby) on Feb 23, 2017 at 1:45am PST Instagram Holly partied with pal Emma Bunton at the swanky BRITS Bash Holly Willoughby and Phillip Schofield talk sex with Jilly Cooper related stories Rita Ora, Holly Willoughby and Fearne Cotton share snaps as they beat their BRIT hangovers SEEING DOUBLE Holly Willoughby suffers BRITS wardrobe nightmare as another partygoer wore the same dress 'Words can kill' Holly Willoughby and Phillip Schofield reduced to tears over teenager driven to suicide by cyberbulling 'Now what happens?' Holly Willoughby almost misses The BRITs as she gets stuck in traffic chaos on her way to the O2 
But if she was flagging at any point, the star hid it well, and was easily distracted during a cheeky chat with 'bonkbuster' author Jilly Cooper. 
The pair burst out laughing as they chatting about swinging, strip poker and feather parties with the raunchy writer. ITV 5 Holly Willoughby and Phillip Schofield got the giggles on This Morning during a chat with Jilly Cooper 
Jilly was on the show to talk about her latest book and her 80th birthday last week, and the chat soon turned to sex. 
The writer talked about people who take part in swinging in the countryside, and she had to explain the concept of "feather parties" to the pair. 
She revealed it is just like "strip poker" as the players shed a piece of clothing at a time when a feather lands near them, ITV 5 Jilly talked sex during her appearance on the show 
After the hosts suggested Jilly could host a feather party to mark her milestone birthday, she invited the pair. 
Holly said: "I'd love to [come along]" and Phil added: "I'll bring the feather." 
During Jilly's turn on the show, they presented her with a special birthday cake inspired by the cover of her most famous book - Riders. ITV Holly burst out laughing as the interview turned saucy 
After Jilly's appearance, Phil joked to Holly: "So feather party in the summer..." 
Holly added: "She's just so amazing... so cool." 
Phil said: "My favourite guest without question."
